divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were sitting by our fire pit when I looked over to my right and saw something bright orange and round in the sky. I started over to look then started calling to him to open the fence so I could follow it. We jumped over the gate and saw what looked like a glowing orange ball floating across the sky. He went to get his phone and as he turned away it started to arc towards a star and within less than a minute it had disappeared completely from view.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wake Forest
There were no other sightings in Wake Forest on or around August 26th 2012
Summary: Glowing orange ball through sky then arcs and takes off.
